name: Eolfrig

skills.name: Abase
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease Attack] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Damage Multiplier: 3.7 ATK

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)

skills.name: Flow of Morale (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of stealing one random buff from each enemy. Also places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 6: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 3.2 ATK

skills.name: Committed Offensive (Cooldown: 6 turns)
skills.description:
Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15%, then places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1
